description:
I've always wondered if this is real or not, pages of this style, where people from all over the world can meet and have a place. I am a simple person and just looking for mental and emotional happiness. 
on the other hand, I am a hard-working person, loyal and above all loving with my partners, as is the definition of my zodiacal sign.
Some women answer the questions that one writes them in the letters or they only send letters saying beautiful and exciting words, which for which I do not complain.
Photos without so much makeup and without photoshop, they are sexier than photos of models posing before a camera :wink:
